Title: Thoroughly expose and criticize the heinous crimes of the "Gang of Four" and their representatives in Liaoning
Designer: Lu Xun Art Academy (鲁迅美术学院)
Notes: Four-poster set exposing and criticizing the "Gang of Four" in cartoons. In some images, Lin Biao also appears.This is poster three.
Theme: Gang of Four (四人帮)Jiang QingZhang ChunqiaoYao WenyuanWang Hongwen
